EDKANO - Accepts not less than eight (8) points in 
NCE.  
TASUED requires two (2) ‘A’ level passes/NCE Science 
subjects to include Biology.  
ND/HND upper credit in the following specialization: 
Science Laboratory Technology -option in Biology, 
Chemistry AND Microbiology.  
Anatomy, Physiology and Biochemistry  
Food Technology  
SOSU accepts   
IJMB passes in two (2) relevant subjects with theUTME 
requirements.  
ND/HND credit in relevant programmes into 100 level. 
AAUA requires three (3) NCE meritin Education, 
Biology and one (1)relevant teaching Science subject.  
FED-DUTSINMA requires two (2) ‘A ’ level passes in 
Botany/Zoology/Biology and Chemistry. It also accepts 
ND/NCE with good grades in any relevant 
programmes/ subjects.  
  
AAUA, EDALV and UNN accept ‘O’ level pass in 
Mathematics or its equivalent.  
MAUTY and OOU accept a pass in English Lan guage. 
DELSU accepts 'O' level pass in English Language 
provided the candidate has a distinction in ‘O’ level 
Biology.  
 EDLAV  accepts  D7  in  English 
 Language  or Mathematics.  
IMSU  requires  Biology,  Chemistry  and  
Physics/Mathematics.  
ABU accepts   
TC II and requires two (2) other relevant Science 
subjects.  
Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other 
subject from Physics or Geography.
